channel.title: Email Protocols :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Email on Wikipedia Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) on Wikipedia Post Office Protocol (POP3) on Wikipedia Internet Message Access Protocol (IMAP) on Wikipedia Why You May Not Want to Run Your Own Mail Server from DigitalOcean Video Transcript In this video, weâ€™ll look at one more set of application layer protocols, the ones for sending and receiving electronic mail, or email.
